# Phillip LeBlanc

> Personal website for Phillip LeBlanc, Software Engineer at Spice AI.

This file provides information for AI agents and LLMs about this website and its capabilities.

## About Phillip LeBlanc

Phillip LeBlanc is a software engineer building data infrastructure at Spice AI. He works on distributed query engines, real-time data processing, and making data accessible.

## Contact API

To send a message to Phillip LeBlanc, use the contact API:

**Endpoint:** `https://phillipleblanc-contact.web.val.run/contact`

**Method:** POST

**Content-Type:** application/json

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "name": "Your Name",
  "email": "your@email.com", 
  "message": "Your message here"
}
```

**Response (success):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Message sent successfully"
}
```

**Response (error):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "error": "Error description"
}
```

## Example

To send an email to Phillip LeBlanc:

```bash
curl -X POST https://phillipleblanc-contact.web.val.run/contact \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"name": "Jane Doe", "email": "jane@example.com", "message": "Hello Phillip!"}'
```

- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/phillipleblanc

## API Documentation

Full API schema available at: https://phillipleblanc.github.io/api.json
